projects.title: Personal portfolio v2
projects.description: Second iteration of my personal website. Generated server-side as a static site and deployed on Netlify.

projects.title: Color Palette
projects.description: Inspired by the website Coloors.co, the web app generates a random color palette, by fetching data from TheColorApi.

projects.title: Black Jack
projects.description: Mini web app to play BlackJack. Made with Vue and fetching cards data from DeckofCardsApi.com. Built as a PWA, the app can be installed on iOS & Android phones.

projects.title: Express weather app
projects.description: Web app built with Node & Express to start learning back-end. A local API enables data fetching from Mapbox and WeatherStack APIs.

projects.title: Locnest
projects.description: Made in agency, this website is based on WordPress, Javascript and Advanced Custom Fields.

projects.title: Hangman
projects.description: Hangman game made in Object oriented Javascript, fetching random words from an API.

projects.title: Actu-Juridique
projects.description: Made in agency, this website is based on WordPress. Search functionality is based on Algolia.

projects.title: Rinox
projects.description: Made in agency, e-commerce site based on a WooCommerce custom theme.

projects.title: ETS Substance
projects.description: Made in agency, this website is based on WordPress, Javascript and Advanced Custom Fields.
